articles.description: Follow 5 Live Final Score for live scores, radio commentary and text updates from match week three of the league phase of the UEFA Champions League, including Atalanta taking on Celtic, Manchester City up against Sparta Prague, Liverpool facing RB Leipzig and Barcelona up against Bayern Munich.
articles.title: UEFA Champions League LIVE: Man City vs Sparta Prague, RB Leipzig vs Liverpool & Barcelona vs Bayern Munich - scores, radio & text

articles.description: Erling Haaland's "amazing" acrobatic backheel volley for Manchester City against Sparta Prague on Wednesday left many of those who saw it live "speechless".
articles.title: Erling Haaland goal: Man City forward hailed after acrobatic goal in Champions League win over Sparta Prague

articles.description: Liverpool's fine start under Arne Slot continues against RB Leipzig as Darwin Nunez's goal extends their 100% winning record in the Champions League.
articles.title: RB Leipzig 0-1 Liverpool: Darwin Nunez scores as Liverpool win again in Champions League

articles.description: Barcelona winger Raphinha scores a superb hat-trick as his side demolish Bayern Munich in the Champions League league phase.
articles.title: Raphinha scores hat-trick as Barca thrash Bayern

articles.description: Geoff Capes, British shot put record holder and two-time world's strongest man dies aged 75.
articles.title: Geoff Capes: British shot put record holder dies aged 75

articles.description: Former Celtic manager Neil Lennon says the team's gutsy goalless Champions League draw at Atalanta delivered "one of the best results of Brendan Rodgers' career".
articles.title: Atalanta 0-0 Celtic: How Brendan Rodgers earned 'one of his best results' in Champions League draw

articles.description: A sedate news conference ends with Tyson Fury tickling Oleksandr Usyk during their face-off.
articles.title: Usyk vs Fury: Oleksandr Usyk asks Tyson Fury to sign picture of him being punched

articles.description: Substitute Jonathan David scores twice to give Lille a 3-1 win at Atletico Madrid in the Champions League.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 1-3 Lille: Jonathan David double helps visitors sink Atletico

articles.description: Feyenoord end Benfica's unbeaten run in the Champions League with a battling win in Lisbon.
articles.title: Benfica 1-3 Feyenoord: Dutch side hold on to win in Champions League

articles.description: Jose Mourinho mischievously suggests his Manchester United side of 2018 could be awarded the Premier League title.
articles.title: Man Utd vs Fenerbahce: Jose Mourinho quips United could get 2018 Premier League title amid Man City case
